items.title: Career Dynamics: Five Step Approach to Career Change Success

visible_instructors.title: John Rodsett
visible_instructors.job_title: Career Consultant; Author; Media Producer; Lecturer
visible_instructors.name: John

items.headline: The Five Step Approach to Career Change Success will allow you to achieve your career vision…. Your own Career Roadmap.
objectives_summary: Develop and create a practical, manageable and highly effective career roadmap, based on your goals; identify your business strengths and weaknesses, and provide a structure to assist you on your career change journey, utilizing the Five Step Approach.

Specifically you will learn: 	Establish what you really want in a “career”  	Identify your goals and tasks to achieve your chosen career path 	Identify then improve on, your strengths and weaknesses 	Create your identifiable, achievable Career Roadmap  	Execute that Roadmap  	Create/enhance your personal career branding
